content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 13.1%) and broad participation (Breadth: 5/8) supporting a strong bull tilt.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Banking is the clear leader with large weekly gains; Banking ABOVE TREND: AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%), GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%), YKBNK (1W: +6.66% | 1M: +3.14%). Transportation and Heavy Industry show follow-through; TAVHL (1W: +5.52% | 1M: +11.18%) ABOVE TREND, TOASO (1W: +4.59% | 1M: +12.16%) ABOVE TREND.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Energy & Chemicals, Holding and Construction lag on the week; TUPRS (1W: -0.69% | 1M: -4.93%) BELOW TREND, DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND, TKFEN (1W: -6.16% | 1M: +5.31%) CORRECTION.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
VAKBN (1W: +6.74% | 1M: -0.63%) RECOVERY, YKBNK (1W: +6.66% | 1M: +3.14%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND, TAVHL (1W: +5.52% | 1M: +11.18%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND, TKFEN (1W: -6.16% | 1M: +5.31%) CORRECTION, PGSUS (1W: -5.57% | 1M: -3.32%) BELOW TREND, TRALT (1W: -4.46% | 1M: +18.46%) CORRECTION, KRDMD (1W: -3.41% | 1M: +1.16%) CORRECTION.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
Big weekly movers include VAKBN (1W: +6.74% | 1M: -0.63%) RECOVERY, YKBNK (1W: +6.66% | 1M: +3.14%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND, DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND, TKFEN (1W: -6.16% | 1M: +5.31%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banking is driving the market rally and looks structurally strong; AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +5.19% | 1M: +3.60%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +6.74% | 1M: -0.63%) RECOVERY, HALKB (1W: +4.16% | 1M: -6.09%) RECOVERY.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy Industry is mixed with clear winners and laggards; ASELS (1W: +3.37% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND and TOASO (1W: +4.59% | 1M: +12.16%) ABOVE TREND lead, while VESTL (1W: -1.93% | 1M: -8.63%) BELOW TREND and ARCLK (1W: -3.05% | 1M: -1.78%) BELOW TREND drag.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Sector momentum is uneven despite strong quant signals in names like GUBRF; GUBRF (quant top) and TRMET (1W: -4.46% | 1M: +18.46%) CORRECTION merit watch, while TUPRS (1W: -0.69% | 1M: -4.93%) BELOW TREND and SISE (1W: -1.36% | 1M: +4.54%) CORRECTION show short-term pressure.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Lean risk-on: overweight Banks and selective cyclicals (Autos, Defense, Transportation) and trim weak HoldCo/Energy positions; keep tight stops on names in CORRECTION or BELOW TREND.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
ASELS (1W: +3.37% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%) ABOVE TREND, TAVHL (1W: +5.52% | 1M: +11.18%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: -4.46% | 1M: +18.46%) CORRECTION, DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Banking for continuation of leadership, Transportation for recovery plays, and Energy & Chemicals for divergence between quant leaders and short-term CORRECTIONs.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100 reaction around recent highs for continuation; catalysts include local macro/FX flows, bank earnings and any CPI/Fed developments that would re-rate cyclicals; cut positions if leaders fail to hold weekly support or volatility spikes above ~25%.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
RISK-ON market with low volatility and breadth led by Banking and select cyclicals; trade overweight banks, autos and defense while trimming HoldCo and Energy names showing short-term weakness. Key risk is a reversal in breadth or a volatility pickup that flips the regime quickly.
